entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Despite the economic shutdown, President Trump is the only one who can boom the economy again in such a short time. Socialists and Chinese errands have promoted civil riots in addition to the coronavirus. Mr.President Trump is defeating all these adversities and rebuilding the US
